content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) that smelts iron ore into iron plates.
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) that smelts copper ore into copper plates.

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) performing automation research (input: {automation-science-pack: 10}, status: NO_POWER).
- ElectricityGroup connecting small electric poles at positions (9.5, 6.5), (10.5, 7.5), and (8.5, 6.5).

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator at position(-10.5, 18.5)
Consists of:
- Steam Engine at position(-10.5, 18.5) with warnings ["not connected to power network", "no input liquid", "no fluid present in connections"] and connection points at (-10.5, 16.0) and (-10.5, 21.0).
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) with status NO_FUEL and warning "out of fuel"; contains a fluid box holding approximately 190.10 units of water at temperature 15, with connection points at (-5.5, 22.5) and (-5.5, 26.5), a steam output at (-7.5, 24.5), and is linked to fluid system 73318.
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) with status WORKING delivering approximately 99.24 units of water; has a connection point at (-9.5, 23.5) and is connected to fluid system 73318.
- Manual Fuel Feeding System represented by a wooden chest at position(-4.5, 25.5).
- Pipeline Network comprising:
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system = 73318 at position (-5.5, 19.5) (status: WORKING) connecting pipes at positions [(-5.5, 19.5), (-8.5, 21.5), (-6.5, 20.5), …, (-2.5, 27.5), (-3.5, 27.5), (-3.5, 26.5)].
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system = 73317 at position (-2.5, 19.5) (status: EMPTY).
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system = 73330 at position (5.5, 21.5) (status: EMPTY).
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system = 73329 at position (1.5, 23.5) (status: EMPTY).
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system = 73325 at position (-7.5, 25.5) (status: EMPTY).
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system = 73334 at position (0.5, 24.5) (status: EMPTY).
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system = 73333 at position (1.5, 25.5) (status: EMPTY).
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system = 73336 at position (1.5, 27.5) (status: EMPTY).
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system = 73337 at position (4.5, 27.5) (status: EMPTY).
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system = 73338 at position (-0.5, 28.5) (status: EMPTY).

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────────
• Pipeline Connection & Fluid Transfer:
  - Ensure that both source and target connection points are unobstructed, within an effective range, and share matching fluid system assignments.
• Entity Placement & Collision Avoidance:
  - Confirm that target tiles are unoccupied before attempting to place entities.
• Buildable Area Calculation:
  - Use precise position attributes during placement to prevent type-related errors.
• Pipe Group Identification & Fluid System Mapping:
  - Verify that candidate pipe groups are correctly assigned to a fluid system and are located within the required search radius.
• Steam Engine Repositioning Attempts:
  - Repeated attempts to reposition the steam engine using candidate pipe groups with fluid_system identifiers [72654, 72738, 72820, 72904, 72986, 73070, 73152, 73236] returned no candidates. Adjust the fluid system verification, search radius, and spatial alignment to reflect current assignments.
• Boiler Fuel Supply Management:
  - Monitor and replenish boiler fuel levels promptly to avoid operational shutdown.
• General Connection Strategies:
  - Assess environmental constraints and verify inventory levels when attempting entity repositioning or pipeline attachments.
